name: Project Ares
description:
Project Ares

Alpha Version 0.1.1

*IMPORTANT NOTE*

You may encounter a bug on Windows where you will need to press the windows key and click on the game screen to be able to click on the play button.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

*Controls*

WASD - Movement

1 Key - Speed Boost

2 Key - Gravity Boots

3 Key - Time Slow

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

*Story*

You are a supercharged runaway machine. A self aware robot named "Ares". Escaping from your evil creators you must collect health, fuel and master your abilities to escape the laboratory. The scientist have set a timer to destroy the lab and purge all assets, you have a limited time to escape!

*Known Bugs*

UI showing on the main menu, and win screen.
